text: Chibapsetta is an extinct genus of righteye flounder that lived during the Pleistocene epoch in what is now Japan. It is a member of the Pleuronectidae. == Description == It resembled the modern righteye flounders. == Related pages == * Prehistoric fish * List of prehistoric bony fish == References == # Sepkoski, Jack (2002). "A compendium of fossil marine animal genera". Bulletins of American Paleontology. 364: 560. Archived from the original on 2009-02-20. Retrieved 2009-02-27. Category:Flatfish Category:Pleistocene Category:Extinct fish Category:Animals of Japan
title: Chibapsetta
